class.name: AgentLoadException
class.javadoc:
The exception thrown when an agent cannot be loaded into the target Java virtual machine.

This exception is thrown by {@link com.sun.tools.attach.VirtualMachine#loadAgent VirtualMachine.loadAgent} or{@link com.sun.tools.attach.VirtualMachine#loadAgentLibraryVirtualMachine.loadAgentLibrary}, {@link com.sun.tools.attach.VirtualMachine#loadAgentPath loadAgentPath} methods if the agent, or agent library, cannot be loaded.
Constructs an AgentLoadException with no detail message.
Constructs an AgentLoadException with the specified detail message. s the detail message.
